events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but the package still hasn't arrived. The tracking status hasn't updated either.
The customer's message indicates a delay in delivery and lack of tracking updates.
Assigning the case to the delivery support team to investigate the delayed shipment.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us about your order delay. I’m here to help you get an update.
Could you please provide your order number so I can check the shipment status for you?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. I would appreciate any details you can find on the shipping.
Thank you for the order number. We contacted the carrier and found the package was delayed due to a transit issue. We expect delivery in 3 days.
Thanks for the update. I’m glad to hear it should arrive soon. Please keep me informed if anything changes.
We are closing this case with confirmation that the package is on its way and delivery will be made shortly.
Checking in to confirm you have received your order now. Please let us know if you need any more assistance.
The customer confirmed receipt of the order. Case is now formally closed, and we thank them for their patience.
